licence_overview:
If you operate a commercial bingo club you must be licensed.

Licences are obtained from your local magistrates court.

In order to obtain a licence you must be:

* over 21 years old
* live in Northern Ireland, for at least 12 months before the application
* registered, if you are a company
licence_short_description: A bingo licence is needed to operate a commercial bingo club in Northern Ireland.
overview: You need a licence from your local magistrates' court to operate a commercial bingo club in Northern Ireland
title: Bingo Club Licence (Northern Ireland)
